org.opengrok.indexer.util

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.util.IOUtils

  • public final class IOUtils
extends Object
    A small utility class to provide common functionality related to IO so that we don't need to duplicate the logic all over the place.
    Author:
    Trond Norbye <trond.norbye@gmail.com>

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        IOException - if any read error

      • createBOMStrippedReader

        public static Reader createBOMStrippedReader(InputStream stream)
                                      throws IOException
        Create BOM stripped reader from the stream. Charset of the reader is set to UTF-8, UTF-16 or system's default.
        Parameters:
        stream - input stream
        Returns:
        reader for the stream without BOM
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O exception occurred

      • createBOMStrippedReader

        public static Reader createBOMStrippedReader(InputStream stream,
                                             String defaultCharset)
                                      throws IOException
        Create BOM stripped reader from the stream. Charset of the reader is set to UTF-8, UTF-16 or default.
        Parameters:
        stream - input stream
        defaultCharset - default charset
        Returns:
        reader for the stream without BOM
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O exception occurred

      • findBOMEncoding

        public static String findBOMEncoding(byte[] sig)
        Gets a value indicating a UTF encoding if the array starts with a known byte sequence.
        Parameters:
        sig - a sequence of bytes to inspect for a BOM
        Returns:
        null if no BOM was identified; otherwise a defined charset name

      • skipForBOM

        public static int skipForBOM(byte[] sig)
        Gets a value indicating the number of UTF BOM bytes at the start of an array.
        Parameters:
        sig - a sequence of bytes to inspect for a BOM
        Returns:
        0 if the array doesn't start with a BOM; otherwise the number of BOM bytes

      • getFileContent

        public static String getFileContent(File file)
        Get the contents of a file or empty string if the file cannot be read.
        Parameters:
        file - file object
        Returns:
        string with the file contents
